byline.original: By RAPHAEL MINDER and ELISABETH MALKIN

abstract: Spanish construction firm Sacyr Vallehermoso ousts its chairman Luis del Rivero; move could put end to shareholder battle with Repsol, Spain's biggest oil company.
snippet: Sacyr Vallehermoso’s decision to oust Luis Del Rivero could put an end to a shareholder battle with Repsol, Spain’s biggest oil company.
lead_paragraph: Sacyr Vallehermoso’s decision to oust Luis Del Rivero could put an end to a shareholder battle with Repsol, Spain’s biggest oil company.

headline.main: Spanish Construction Firm Ousts Its Chief Executive
headline.print_headline: Spanish Construction Firm Ousts Its Chief Executive
